statements: SELECT * FROM film_crew WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, role FROM film_crew WHERE years_of_experience > 5 ORDER BY name;
SELECT id, name, role FROM film_crew WHERE role = 'Director' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, years_of_experience FROM film_crew WHERE years_of_experience BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT * FROM film_crew WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT id, name, role, years_of_experience FROM film_crew WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM film_crew WHERE years_of_experience > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, role FROM film_crew WHERE name LIKE 'S%' AND role = 'Director';
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM film_crew ORDER BY role;
SELECT name, years_of_experience FROM film_crew WHERE role IN ('Director', 'Producer') ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM film_crew;
SELECT crew_id, name, position FROM film_crew WHERE department='Production';
SELECT name, department FROM film_crew ORDER BY department, name ASC;
SELECT project_name, director FROM film_projects WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM film_projects ORDER BY release_date DESC, project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM film_crew WHERE position = 'Director';
SELECT name, department FROM film_crew WHERE department = 'Production';
SELECT name, position, department FROM film_crew WHERE department = 'Cinematography' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM film_projects WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT project_name, director FROM film_projects WHERE director = 'Steven Spielberg';
SELECT * FROM films;
SELECT film_title, release_year FROM films WHERE release_year > 2000;
SELECT crew_name, job_title FROM film_crew ORDER BY crew_name ASC;
SELECT film_title, release_year FROM films WHERE release_year = 2021;
SELECT crew_name, job_title, film_title, role FROM film_crew JOIN crew_assignments ON film_crew.crew_id = crew_assignments.crew_id WHERE role = 'Actor';
SELECT * FROM film_crew WHERE crew_id = 1;
SELECT film_title, release_year FROM films WHERE release_year > 2010;
SELECT crew_name, job_title FROM film_crew ORDER BY job_title ASC;
SELECT film_title, release_year FROM films JOIN crew_assignments ON films.film_id = crew_assignments.film_id WHERE crew_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT job_title FROM film_crew;
SELECT * FROM film_crew;
SELECT crew_name, position FROM film_crew;
SELECT film_title, release_date, genre FROM films;
SELECT crew_id, department FROM film_crew;
SELECT role_name FROM crew_roles;
SELECT * FROM film_crew;
SELECT film_title, genre FROM films WHERE release_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT crew_name, position, department FROM film_crew ORDER BY department, crew_name DESC;
SELECT film_title, genre, duration FROM films WHERE genre = 'Comedy' AND duration > 120;
SELECT film_title, release_date FROM films ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM film_directors ORDER BY director_name DESC;
SELECT director_name, nationality, age FROM film_writers WHERE nationality='USA';
SELECT * FROM film_producers WHERE company_name LIKE '%Pictures%';
SELECT writer_name, age, writer_rating FROM film_writers WHERE writer_rating > 8.0;
SELECT actor_name, character_name, gender FROM film_cast ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM film_directors
SELECT director_name, nationality, director_rating FROM film_directors WHERE age > 40
SELECT producer_name, company_name, email FROM film_producers ORDER BY producer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM film_writers WHERE writer_rating > 8.0 AND nationality = 'French'
SELECT actor_name, character_name, gender FROM film_cast WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
